Detailed Description

This action orbits particles around a point.

It does not use Newtonian physics - it just displaces the particle an angle around the point in space.

void OrbitorPSA::angularVelocity ( float  newVelocity  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the angular velocity of the OrbitorPSA.

The value is supplied in degrees per second, but stored as radians.

Parameters:
newVelocity The new velocity in degrees per second.

float OrbitorPSA::angularVelocity ( void   )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the angular velocity of the OrbitorPSA.

The value is stored in radians, though it is transferred to the user via degrees.

Returns:
A value in degrees per second.
